Under Eric Schmidt , Google has introduced gamechanging products like Gmail, Chrome, and Android. In this new role I know[ Larry] will merge Google's technology and business vision brilliantly. I am enormously proud of my last decade as CEO, and I am certain that the next 10 years under Larry will be even better! Larry, in my clear opinion, is ready to lead, Eric Schmidt said in the announcement. Eric Schmidt will be transition to a new role as executive chairman. So what do we know about Google's new CEO? Sergio Marchionne used the term "shyster loans" three times Friday in an address at an auto dealer's convention in San Francisco, but he issued a statement the next day expressing his regrets. I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern. I regret the remark which I consider inappropriate, Sergio Marchionne said in his statement.
